summary: Carbyne Claude: Portable DC runtime on USB. Self-contained claude.ai wrapper with PhiSHRI, MCP servers, missions, agents - plug and play on any Windows machine.
quick_start: Plug USB, run carbyne.exe, DC runtime boots with full context
common_patterns: Single exe + data folder = fully portable
WebView2 bootstraps from system or bundled
known_errors: WebView2 runtime may need bootstrap on fresh machines
Large binary if bundling all MCP servers

etymology.graphene: 2D carbon allotrope - strongest material, single atom thick. Carbyne's foundation.
etymology.carbyne: 1D carbon chain - 2x stronger than graphene. The name.
etymology.cyberdyne: Skynet creators. Miles Dyson. AI emergence.
etymology.carbine: Standard issue rifle. Reliable, effective, gets it done.
etymology.carbon: Element of life. What we're made of. Creators building creation.

stages.1_foundation: DONE - Tauri wrapper, DC injection, tray, JS bridge
stages.2_portable_structure: TODO - Self-contained folder layout, relative paths
stages.3_mcp_integration: TODO - Rust MCP client, server management
